Minisoria is a boutique brand offering handcrafted goods and sustainable food products. Our mission is to promote sustainability through ethical sourcing, eco-friendly practices, and seamless e-commerce services.

We use carbon-neutral shipping options and eco-friendly packaging materials. Shipping timelines may vary; customers will be informed of any significant delays. Due to the nature of our products, returns and refunds will only be accepted if it is clearly proven that the issue was caused by us. Requests must be submitted within 7 days of receiving the order, along with clear evidence. 

➡️Sustainability Commitment

Minisoria is committed to ethical sourcing, upcycling, waste reduction, and environmental responsibility.

Contact Us
